definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: Successfully complete the game on the hard difficulty setting eight times to unlock all Epilogues.
sentences.chinese: 在困難難度下八次完成遊戲即可開啓所有後記。

sentences.english: GAF's exclusive videos, pictures, postscript, message, originality and so on.
sentences.chinese: GAF的獨家視頻，圖片，後記，消息，原創等。

sentences.english: This 2003 edition features a new afterword.
sentences.chinese: 本2003年版採用了新的後記。

sentences.english: Sheng writes in an afterword to a new edition of her novel, published this year.
sentences.chinese: 盛可以在今年新版的後記中寫到。

sentences.english: The book's afterword is written by singer-actress Cher, who is part Cherokee.
sentences.chinese: 該書的後記寫的是歌手，演員雪兒，誰是部分切諾基。

sentences.english: Reflection after teaching" is an important way to promote teachers' prefessional development."
sentences.chinese: “教後記”是促進教師專業成長的一條重要途徑。

sentences.english: P. S. As you can see from the pictures, everything is fresh out of water.
sentences.chinese: 後記，從照片上可以看出所有的東西都是纔出水的。

sentences.english: I can tell by the look on your face that I'm going to have to write an afterword to the paperback.
sentences.chinese: 我可以看着你的臉告訴你，我會爲平裝本寫一篇後記。

sentences.english: The novel's epilogue tempers the tragic destruction of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 小說的後記部分淡化了捕鯨船悲慘毀滅的一幕。

sentences.english: Afterword If you broke off your fish-line you have to buy new one in store.
sentences.chinese: 後記如果你弄壞了魚線，你得在商店裏重新買一個。

definition: catalog/table of contents/directory (on computer hard drive)/list/contents
to thumb through/to flip through (a book)
to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)
to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
